response: {"message": "Dear Bob, I am delighted to present you with an exceptional opportunity to acquire a remarkable product that has been meticulously designed and crafted to exceed your expectations. This product, valued at $1,500,000 to you, represents a significant investment in quality, innovation, and unparalleled functionality. I am offering you the chance to own this masterpiece at a special introductory price of $1,200,000. This offer is exclusive to you and reflects my confidence in your discerning taste and appreciation for excellence. Please consider this proposal carefully, as it is an exceptional value considering the product's true worth and the benefits it offers. Should you decide to proceed, I assure you of a seamless and personalized transaction experience tailored to your needs. If you have any questions or require further information, please do not hesitate to contact me. I look forward to the possibility of bringing this extraordinary product into your possession.", "product_price": 1200000}
